nodes.text: Outpost Rennar was a small Mandalorian settlement located west of Breezefield Farms in the Jundland Wastes of the planet Tatooine where the small clan would constantly engage against the local Tusken Raider tribes. During the Cold War, the Mandalorians reluctantly allowed the Sith Empire to use Outpost Rennar as a base for the profit of credits and challenge. But Zola Arvannus of the Imperial Diplomatic Service was instructed to acquire an independent location for their outpost; to this end, Imperial forces worked to drive a group of hostile Gamorreans from the nearby farms, though they continued to push their limits with their Mandalorian allies as Commander Warr'an grew to have concerns about their true intentions.

Outpost Rennar was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It appears as one of the Imperial settlements on the planet Tatooine.
